original_title: Sri Lanka reaches final debt restructuring agreement with creditors
original_body_lines: Sri Lanka has reached a final restructuring agreement for USD 5.8 billion of debt with its bilateral lenders’ Official Creditor Committee in Paris, France a short while ago.

This agreement grants significant debt relief, allowing Sri Lanka to allocate funds to essential public services and secure concessional financing for its development needs, the President’s Media Division (PMD) said.
